country.Detail: The Statue of Liberty is a 305-foot (93-metre) statue located on Liberty Island in New York City.
country.Details: The statue is a personification of liberty in the form of a woman. She holds a torch in her raised right hand and clutches a tablet in her left. The Statue of Liberty is most well known for its impressive presence in New York Harbor.

country.Detail: Is the tomb of the Mughal Emperor Humayum in Delhi, India
country.Details: This tomb, built in 1570, is of particular cultural significance as it was the first garden-tomb on the Indian subcontinent.

country.Detail: The largest metropolis and the most popular tourist place in Australia.

country.Details: Lourdes is very significant and awe inspiring pilgrimage site, known for Our Lady shrine. Located at the foothills of Pyrenees, this market town is a must see among all the places to visit in France.

country.Detail: Japan is situated in the Pacific Ocean and is a picturesque island country.
country.Details: Japan is a beautiful country filled with surprises for every type of traveller, from adventure seekers to history buffs. The country offers you a lot to do and see, from temples and shrines to mountains, gardens, palaces, and skyscrapers.

country.Detail: Along with Mount Tate and Mount Haku, Mount Fuji forms the ‘Three Holy Mountains’ in Japan
country.Details: Mt. Fuji is the epitome of natural beauty and is a haven for mountaineers. The mountain has many names: Fuji-san, Fujisan, Sanmyaku, and Hakone-san. A  UNESCO World Heritage Site since 2013, Mt. Fuji has been considered sacred since ancient times, and it is one of the few tourist places in Japan where you can see snow on top of a volcano.

country.Detail: This special place is amongst the beautiful USA landmarks to visit.
country.Details: his place being one of the most famous places in America is definitely worth a visit. And not just its natural beauty, the Glacier National Park also offers a variety of activities and attractions that will appeal to everyone in your group. So, if you’re wondering whether or not it is among the most famous things in USA, the answer is absolute yes!

country.Detail: Old Towns of Malacca & George (Penang)
country.Details: Escaping from the modern life of the bigger metropolises, Malacca and George Town in Penang are two historic attractions featuring unique cultural heritage of East-meets-West architecture and multi-ethnic community. Once thriving and busy ports, two towns are the home to numerous colonial buildings, ancient shophouses, and magnificent traditional sites, which showcase their hundreds of years of cultural and trade exchange between the East and the West in the past.
